column4: hey, for some reason my apache serves php files as text, even tho I do have php5 installed according to tutorials, I tried googling, :/ what to do next?
you sure you apache conf file got the extra modules in there for php?

I've gone trough the apache2.conf file, and yes, it seems to include php5 module (as it imports all modules from a certain folder, and php module is there, and if I try to manually add php5 module, it complains that it's already running)
